statements: UPDATE trading_analysis SET trade_volume = 100 WHERE trade_id = 1;
UPDATE trading_analysis SET investor_sentiment = 4.5, trade_type = 'SELL' WHERE trade_symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE trading_analysis SET trade_volume = 1000, investor_sentiment = 4.5 WHERE trade_id = 123;
UPDATE trading_analysis SET investor_sentiment = 3.75, trade_type = 'SELL' WHERE trade_symbol = 'AAPL' AND trade_date = '2021-10-15';
UPDATE portfolio_management SET investment_amount = 5000 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE trading_patterns SET pattern_details = 'Long-term investment strategy' WHERE pattern_id = 3;
UPDATE portfolio_management SET email='newemail@example.com', investment_amount=5000 WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE trading_patterns SET pattern_details='New pattern details' WHERE pattern_id=10;
UPDATE trades SET trade_volume = 100 WHERE trade_id = 1;
UPDATE investor_sentiment SET sentiment_score = 0.75, sentiment_date = '2022-09-20' WHERE sentiment_id = 5;
UPDATE trades SET trade_timestamp = NOW(), trade_volume = 100 WHERE trade_id = 1;
UPDATE portfolio_strategies SET strategy_name = 'Growth Portfolio', strategy_description = 'Focus on long-term growth' WHERE strategy_id = 3;
UPDATE TradingPatterns SET pattern_name = 'New Pattern 1', pattern_details = 'Updated details for Pattern 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE InvestorSentiment SET sentiment_date = '2022-08-15', sentiment = 'Bullish' WHERE investor_id = 101;
UPDATE TradingPatterns SET pattern_details = 'New details updated' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE AIAnalysis SET analysis_results = '{"accuracy": 0.85, "status": "completed"}' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE portfolio_management SET optimization_strategy = 'Risk-Adjusted Return' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE investor_sentiment SET sentiment_score = 0.75, recommendation = 'Buy' WHERE investor_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE portfolio_management SET optimization_strategy = 'Risk-Adjusted Return' WHERE portfolio_name = 'Tech Stocks Portfolio';
UPDATE investor_sentiment SET sentiment_score = 0.75, recommendation = 'Strong Buy' WHERE investor_name = 'John Doe';
